post:
It seems that @FAT32 missed or chose not to include our shared hosting offers, so I am shamelessly posting them after-the-fact now. Whip me if not allowed or delete my post and ruin my life!

Server is placed at Hetzner's Falkenstein location.

Our setup is running on AMD EPYC cpu's with 32 cores / 64 threads and all SSD's in ZFS RAID-Z2. We use CloudLinux, Imunify360, MailChannels delivery, DirectAdmin, LiteSpeed and the very special PHP Selektor - all is top notch.
DirectAdmin have unlimited everything, so all the domains you can fit, databases, mail accounts etc.

LVE limits:

200% CPU
4 GB RAM
20 MB/s IO
10240 IOPS
50 EP
100 NPROC

Disk space: 1GB SSD
Price: ~$6 USD recurring per year, billed in Danish kr.
Signup link: https://customer.duelhost.dk/cart.php?a=add&pid=14&language=English

Disk space: 5GB SSD
Price: ~$12 USD recurring per year, billed in Danish kr.
Signup link: https://customer.duelhost.dk/cart.php?a=add&pid=15&language=English

Disk space: 20GB for 30USD
Price: ~$30 USD recurring per year, billed in Danish kr.
Signup link (Promo code pre-applied so price will be updated before payment): https://customer.duelhost.dk/cart.php?a=add&pid=16&billingcycle=annually&language=English&promocode=20FOR30
